item.title: 中国科技界和政界领袖展现团结风采
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，高渊将讲述中国公私科技合作中的重要一天。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Gao Yuan recounts a momentous day in China’s public-private tech endeavors.】

item.title: 世贸组织会议拉开帷幕，贸易 "动荡 "列入议程
item.description: 世界贸易组织自唐纳德-特朗普宣誓连任美国总统以来的首次总理事会会议于周二开始，并将持续到周三，闭门会议议程长达 15 个项目。【原文：The World Trade Organization’s first General Council meeting since Donald Trump was sworn in for a second term as US president gets underway Tuesday and will stretch into Wednesday with an agenda for the closed-door session that’s 15 items long.】

item.title: 婴儿配方奶粉供应链断裂时挺身而出的初创企业
item.description:
Bobbie 在网络父母中树立了崇拜者形象—一次发布一条 TikTok 消息和一罐有机奶粉。【原文：

Bobbie has built a cultlike following among online parents—one TikTok post and can of organic formula at a time.

】

item.title: 习近平的科技会议是中国经济的积极信号
item.description: 我是驻悉尼的国际经济编辑马尔科姆-斯科特。今天，我们将关注中国国家主席习近平与商界领袖的会晤及其对经济的意义。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics editor in Sydney. Today we’re looking at Chinese President Xi Jinping’s meeting with business leaders and what it signifies for the economy. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 乌克兰谈判推低天然气期货，德国电价下滑
item.description: 由于天然气期货下跌，德国年前电力价格跌至 1 月初以来的最低点，凸显出德国比邻国更依赖天然气燃料。【原文：German year-ahead power prices slumped to their lowest since early January as gas futures dropped, underlining the country’s stronger reliance on the fuel than its neighbors.】

item.title: Diamondback 公司通过双鹰交易扩展二叠纪石油资产
item.description: Diamondback Energy Inc. 同意收购 Double Eagle IV Midco LLC 的部分子公司后，将扩大其在二叠纪盆地的石油资产。【原文：Diamondback Energy Inc. will expand its oil assets in the Permian Basin after agreeing to acquire some subsidiaries of Double Eagle IV Midco LLC, a significant asset boost for the top independent oil and gas producer in North America’s most prolific shale patch.】

item.title: 英国央行贝利称特朗普关税导致债券波动不受欢迎
item.description: 英格兰银行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）表示，他希望看到债券市场减少波动，他认为这在很大程度上是由于围绕美国关税发布的一系列公告造成的。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey said he’d like to see less volatility in bond markets, much of which he puts down to a flurry of announcements around US tariffs.】

item.title: 英国就桑杰-沙的税务交易对第八家伦敦经纪商处以罚款
item.description: 英国当局完成了对 Cum-Ex 交易的第八次调查，对伦敦一家经纪公司处以 160 万英镑（200 万美元）的罚款，因为该公司参与执行了臭名昭著的税务交易，导致欧洲国库损失数十亿欧元。【原文：UK authorities completed their eighth investigation into Cum-Ex trades, fining a London brokerage firm £1.6 million ($2 million) for its involvement in executing the notorious tax deals that have cost European treasuries billions of euros.】

item.title: 检察官调查意大利海岸附近油轮可能发生的爆炸
item.description: 意大利港口城市萨沃纳的检察官和热那亚的一个反恐小组正在调查周末可能发生的损坏 Seajewel 号油轮船体的爆炸事件。【原文：Prosecutors in the Italian port city of Savona and an anti-terrorist unit in Genoa are investigating a possible explosion that damaged the hull of the Seajewel oil tanker over the weekend.】

item.title: 动荡世界中的信贷市场异常平静
item.description: 全球信贷市场的价格走势如此平静，以至于一些资金经理在想，公司债券的无情反弹是否正在成为一面红旗。【原文：Price moves in the global credit market are so calm that some money managers are wondering whether a relentless rally in corporate bonds is becoming a red flag.】

item.title: 在 DeepSeek 爆炸之前，聊天机器人竞技场宣布了它的到来
item.description:
聊天机器人的众包评级系统已成为人工智能业内人士了解哪些模型最有效的方式。【原文：

A crowdsourced rating system for chatbots has become the way AI insiders learn which models work best.

】

item.title: 欧洲央行降息不能取代经济政策，霍尔茨曼说
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员罗伯特-霍尔兹曼（Robert Holzmann）认为，欧洲中央银行降低借贷成本并不能替代稳健的经济政策。【原文：Reductions in borrowing costs by the European Central Bank are no substitute for sound economic policy, according to Governing Council member Robert Holzmann.】

item.title: 思科和 IBM 展示老牌科技公司也能成为人工智能赢家
item.description: 2025 年，许多最大、最受欢迎的科技股都跌跌不休，但该行业的一些老牌公司却重新引起了人们的关注。【原文：While many of the biggest and most popular technology stocks have stumbled out of the gates in 2025, some of the sector’s legacy names are drawing renewed attention.】

item.title: 国债收益率攀升，交易员寻求美联储路径的进一步线索
item.description: 在上周的经济报告模糊了对物价压力的评估之后，交易员们寻求对美国利率走势的进一步指导，国债因此下滑。【原文：Treasuries slipped as traders sought further guidance on the path of US interest rates following economic reports last week that muddied their assessment of price pressures.】

item.title: 北极空气冻结欧洲，但温暖天气即将到来
item.description: 一股北极气流给欧洲部分地区带来了短暂的寒冷，柏林创下了今冬的最低气温，但温暖的天气即将到来。【原文：A blast of arctic air is bringing a brief frigid snap to parts of Europe, with Berlin recording its lowest temperatures this winter, but warmer weather is on its way.】

item.title: 关税紧张局势未能动摇股市牛市创纪录的预期
item.description: 在关税紧张局势和顽固的高通胀对美国股市造成冲击之际，华尔街的看涨预测者们正敦促投资者坚持到底。【原文：As tariff tensions and stubbornly high inflation whipsaw US stocks, bullish Wall Street forecasters are urging investors to stay the course.】

item.title: 挪威央行财富基金首席执行官一职收到 82 份应聘申请
item.description: 在现任总裁尼古拉-坦根（Nicolai Tangen）的第一个任期即将结束之际，挪威银行收到了82份申请，要求担任挪威1.8万亿美元主权财富基金的总裁。【原文：Norges Bank received 82 applications for the job to run Norway’s $1.8 trillion sovereign wealth fund, as current chief Nicolai Tangen’s first period comes to an end.】

item.title: 投票前德国投资者前景两年来最乐观
item.description: 投资者对德国经济的信心达到了两年来的最高点，本周末的选举将产生一个更有利于市场的政府，而降息也将刺激需求。【原文：Investor confidence in Germany’s economy improved by the most in two years, with elections this weekend set to produce a more market-friendly government and interest-rate cuts bolstering demand.】

item.title: 美联储希望就业复苏具有包容性。有人问这是否助长了通货膨胀
item.description: 在对其政策战略进行五年来的首次正式审查时，美联储官员们正在面对一个大楼外许多人已经提出的问题：在大流行病之后，他们雄心勃勃地要实现更具包容性的就业市场复苏的目标，是否减缓了他们对通胀飙升的反应？【原文：In the first formal review of their policy strategy in five years, Federal Reserve officials are confronting a question that many outside the building have already taken up: Did their ambitious goals for a more inclusive job-market recovery after the pandemic slow their response to surging inflation?】

item.title: 优步支持的莱姆公司预订量增长超过 30%，正准备上市
item.description: 共享电动自行车和滑板车网络运营商莱姆公司（Lime）承诺，在2024年创下出行记录后，将保持两位数的预订量增长。【原文：Lime, the operator of a shared electric bike and scooter network, pledged to sustain double-digit bookings growth after posting record trips in 2024, a goal the company said will prime it to follow through on a long-expected initial public offering.】

item.title: 道达尔能源与液化空气计划成立 6 亿欧元氢气合资企业
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）和液化空气公司（Air Liquide SA）计划成立一家价值 6 亿欧元（6.28 亿美元）的合资企业，为这家法国石油巨头位于荷兰的炼油厂生产绿色氢气，同时为其位于比利时的石化厂提供氢气。【原文：TotalEnergies SE and Air Liquide SA plan a €600 million ($628 million) joint venture to produce green hydrogen for the French oil giant’s refinery in the Netherlands, along with a supply deal for its petrochemical plant in Belgium.】

item.title: 数据调整后尼日利亚通胀放缓，利率前景不明朗
item.description: 尼日利亚统计局修订了用于计算家庭支出的数据后，1 月份的年通货膨胀率有所下降，这给利率前景蒙上了阴影。【原文：Nigeria’s annual inflation rate fell in January after the statistics office revised the data used to calculate household expenditure, clouding the interest-rate outlook.】

item.title: Robinhood 预计 2025 年在新加坡推出加密货币产品
item.description: Robinhood Markets 公司计划在 2025 年通过其最近收购的欧洲数字资产交易所 Bitstamp Ltd. 的一个实体推出新加坡加密货币产品。【原文：Robinhood Markets Inc. plans to launch Singapore crypto offerings in 2025 through an entity of European digital-assets exchange Bitstamp Ltd., which it recently acquired.】

item.title: 美国银行调查显示，投资者的风险偏好为 15 年来最高
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的一项调查显示，全球股市已成为最受投资者欢迎的资产类别，投资者承担风险的意愿是 15 年来最高的。【原文：Global stocks have become the most popular asset class with investors, who are showing the biggest willingness to take risk in 15 years, according to a survey by Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司的救援贷款获得伦敦法官批准
item.description: 伦敦一名法官批准了泰晤士河水务公司（Thames Water）的一笔关键性救援贷款，使该公司在继续与贷款方谈判重组的同时获得了一些急需的喘息空间。【原文：A London judge approved a crucial rescue loan for Thames Water, giving the utility some much needed breathing room while it continues to negotiate a restructuring with its lenders.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯 3200 亿美元养老基金负责人即将卸任
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的一份内部备忘录，沙特阿拉伯价值 3200 亿美元的养老基金管理公司负责人在任职 12 年后，将于今年晚些时候卸任。【原文：The head of Saudi Arabia’s $320 billion pension fund manager is stepping down later this year after 12 years in the role, according to an internal memo seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 南非失业率连续两个季度下降
item.description: 由于金融业和制造业增加了就业岗位，南非第四季度的失业率有所下降。【原文：South Africa’s unemployment rate fell in the fourth quarter as finance and manufacturing added jobs.】

item.title: 新加坡 25 财年预算盈余 68 亿新元
item.description: 新加坡总理黄遵宪在周二向国会发表的预算演讲中表示，新加坡预计 2025 财年的预算盈余将达到 68 亿新元。【原文：Singapore expects a budget surplus of S$6.8 billion for FY2025, Prime Minister Lawrence Wong says in his budget speech to parliament on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国人工智能竞争白热化，百度收入下滑
item.description: 百度公司（Baidu Inc.【原文：Baidu Inc. reported a smaller-than-expected revenue drop, alleviating concerns its internet search and artificial intelligence businesses are buckling under fierce competition.】

item.title: 新世界建议增加 38 亿美元贷款抵押品
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港开发商新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Co.【原文：Hong Kong developer New World Development Co. has proposed using $3.8 billion of additional properties as collateral to refinance bank loans maturing in 2027 and beyond, according to people familiar with the matter, as it looks to ease liquidity pressure.】
